instruction: If a meal is delayed more than three hours, wait until you have at least a snack with some fat, like nuts or yogurt, before taking the medication. Taking it without food cuts absorption in half.

attributes.comment: If a meal is delayed more than three hours, wait until you have at least a snack with some fat, like nuts or yogurt, before taking the medication. Taking it without food cuts absorption in half.

instruction: Shellfish allergy does not overlap with this drug, but carrying an antihistamine like Benadryl in your kit is still wise.

coding.display: Patient advised to buy medical kit

attributes.comment: Carrying an antihistamine like Benadryl in your kit is still wise.

instruction: Vivid dreams are rare with atovaquone-proguanil; more common with mefloquine, so you should be fine.

attributes.comment: Vivid dreams are rare with atovaquone-proguanil; more common with mefloquine, so you should be fine.
